caption.p: Effect of the EOCL on percentage number of entries into open arms (Panel A) and percentage time spent on open arms (Panel B) of the epm.
VEH, EOCL and DZM represent vehicle (5% Tween 80), essential oil of C. longa and diazepam respectively.
*p < 0.05, **p < 0.01; significant compared to vehicle group (ANOVA, Dunnett’s test).
